Management IP Addresses:

+---------------------------+---------------------------+
| **Site 1**                | **Site 2**                |
+===========================+===========================+
| bigip1.site1 = 10.1.10.11 | bigip1.site2 = 10.1.10.21 |
+---------------------------+---------------------------+
| bigip2.site1 = 10.1.10.12 | bigip2.site2 = 10.1.10.22 |
+---------------------------+---------------------------+
| gtm1.site1 = 10.1.10.13   | gtm1.site2 = 10.1.10.23   |
+---------------------------+---------------------------+
